serviceAds.desc: Optimize costs - Increase revenue - Lead search results with effective Google advertising strategy.

features.title: Precise Targeting
features.desc: Target the right potential customers based on search behavior, demographics and interests

features.title: Data-Driven Optimization
features.desc: Optimize campaigns based on real data, performance analysis and real-time adjustments

features.title: Maximum ROAS
features.desc: Commit to optimal advertising return on ad spend, helping businesses achieve maximum efficiency with budget

types.name: Search Ads
types.desc: Appear on Google search results when customers search for related keywords
features: Display when there is search intent

types.name: Display Ads
types.desc: Banner image ads on Google Display Network, YouTube and partner websites

types.name: Video Ads
types.desc: Video ads on YouTube and display network, attracting attention with visual content

steps.title: Market & Competitor Analysis
steps.desc: We start by researching the market, analyzing competitors and user behavior.

steps.title: Advertising Strategy Development
steps.desc: Develop detailed plan with keywords, budget, ad templates and communication messages.

steps.title: Campaign Implementation & Tracking
steps.desc: Start running ads, track effectiveness and make real-time adjustments.

steps.title: Reporting, Evaluation & Optimization
steps.desc: Summarize results, send periodic reports and propose next optimization solutions.

serviceAds.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Using Google Ads Service

benefits.title: Reach the Right Target Customers
benefits.desc: Google Ads helps your business display to the right people searching for similar products or services.

benefits.title: Optimize Advertising Costs
benefits.desc: Spend effectively thanks to flexible budget control and detailed performance measurement.

benefits.title: Quick Revenue Growth
benefits.desc: Higher conversions by targeting the right needs, driving potential customers and sales.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Google Ads

items.question: How long does Google Ads take to show results?
items.answer: Typically 2-4 weeks to see initial results. Campaigns will be continuously optimized in the first 3 months to achieve maximum performance.

items.question: Is there a commitment to advertising effectiveness?
items.answer: We commit to optimizing ROAS and improving performance at each stage. Transparent reporting of all spending metrics and results.

items.question: Does the cost include advertising budget?
items.answer: Service costs and advertising budget are separate. We manage and optimize your advertising budget most effectively.

ctaSection.title: Ready to grow revenue with Google Ads?
ctaSection.desc: Register now to receive FREE account audit and optimized advertising strategy

serviceInvoice.title: Google Ads Invoice

hero.desc: Rent a Google Ads Invoice account ‚Äî a solution for stable campaigns, high spending limits, and transparent invoiced payments.
hero.metaText: Free account setup ‚Ä¢ Full VAT invoice support

serviceInvoice.overviewTitle: Overview of Google Ads Invoice Accounts
serviceInvoice.overviewText: Google Ads Invoice accounts are issued to trusted businesses/partners, saving verification time and reducing payment suspension risk.

benefits.title: Fast approval, high limits
benefits.desc: Invoice accounts often have higher limits and faster approval for businesses.

benefits.title: Stable operation
benefits.desc: Verified accounts reduce payment issues and interruptions.

benefits.title: VAT invoicing
benefits.desc: Support for full VAT invoices and transparent billing.

benefits.title: Fit for all sizes
benefits.desc: Flexible plans for SMEs to large enterprises.

serviceInvoice.advantagesTitle: Advantages of Google Ads Invoice Accounts
serviceInvoice.advantagesDesc: With automation, invoices are created and sent quickly, reducing manual processing time and errors.
serviceInvoice.pricingDesc: Service fees are calculated as a percentage of ad spend (market standard). SMADS keeps pricing transparent for all budgets.
serviceInvoice.noteText: Rates can be negotiated depending on budget & partnership duration. Full VAT invoices supported.

hero.title: Comprehensive SEO Service - Get Your Website to TOP Google
hero.desc: Smads provides in-depth SEO solutions, comprehensive optimization from Onpage, Offpage to Technical SEO. Committed to clear results, transparent reporting.

searchResults.title: Professional SEO Service - Top Google Ranking | Smads
searchResults.desc: Smads provides comprehensive SEO services, optimizing websites to top Google quickly and sustainably. SEO team with 10+ years experience.

searchResults.title: SEO Website - Increase natural traffic 300% | Smads
searchResults.desc: Data-driven SEO strategy, optimize conversion rate and increase revenue from organic traffic. Committed to clear results.

items.name: Technical SEO
items.desc: Optimize speed, website structure, schema markup, and fix technical errors

items.name: Content SEO
items.desc: Build content strategy, keyword research and content optimization

items.name: Off-page SEO
items.desc: Build quality backlinks, brand mentions and social signals

steps.title: Audit & Analysis
steps.desc: Comprehensive website evaluation, competitor analysis, strategic keyword research and SEO goal setting

steps.title: Technical SEO Optimization
steps.desc: Fix technical errors, optimize website speed, URL structure, meta tags and user experience across all devices

steps.title: Content & Onpage SEO
steps.desc: Build content strategy, optimize onpage, develop high-quality content and internal linking

steps.title: Offpage & Reporting
steps.desc: Build quality backlinks, ranking monitoring, traffic analysis and detailed monthly results reporting

items.question: How long does SEO take to reach top?
items.answer: Depending on industry and competition: 3-6 months for low competition keywords, 6-12 months for premium keywords. We commit to monthly progress reports.

items.question: Is there a commitment to results?
items.answer: We commit to traffic growth, keyword positions and performance at each stage. Transparent reporting of all metrics.

items.question: What does SEO cost include?
items.answer: Includes: Technical audit, keyword research, content creation, link building, monitoring and reporting. No hidden additional costs.

cta.title: Ready to conquer TOP Google?
cta.desc: Register now to receive FREE Website Audit and suitable SEO strategy consultation

hero.title: Website Design Service
hero.description: AdsDigi builds modern websites, fast loading, compatible with all devices and optimized for conversion. Support for clear source code handover, administration training and professional warranty.

steps.title: Receive Request & Consultation
steps.description: Customer sends request, we analyze and consult the most suitable solution.

steps.title: Planning & Quotation
steps.description: Build detailed timeline, design plan and send transparent quotation.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.description: Implement interface design, program features and optimize user experience.

steps.title: Testing & Handover
steps.description: Comprehensive website testing, usage training and product handover.

items.question: How long does it take to complete a website?
items.answer: Depending on scale: from 7-14 days for information sites, 2-6 weeks for complex sites.

items.question: Can I update content myself?
items.answer: Yes ‚Äî we hand over CMS or guide operations for you to self-administer.

items.question: Is there support after handover?
items.answer: Yes ‚Äî warranty package + optional support package, quick response within 24-72h.

list.title: Marketing Workshop 2025
list.desc: A sharing session on modern marketing skills for small and medium businesses.
list.content: In the Marketing Workshop 2025, SMADS introduced the latest marketing trends ‚Äî from content strategy and social media management to the application of AI in advertising. The event attracted many young entrepreneurs and received positive feedback.

list.title: Team Building Da Nang 2025
list.desc: A bonding journey for SMADS with exciting and creative outdoor activities.
list.content: The Team Building Da Nang trip was a wonderful opportunity for SMADS members to connect and create memorable moments together. The program featured beach games at My Khe that fostered teamwork and creativity.

list.title: Summer Brand Campaign
list.desc: SMADS partners with clients to launch creative brand campaigns across platforms.
list.content: The Summer Brand Campaign helped SMADS‚Äô partners reach millions of customers across social media platforms, increasing brand awareness effectively and creatively.
